channel.title: Looking for a good coder :(
channel.description:
hey guys im looking for a good coder to help me take off some commands and add some plz reply
i need help with REMOVING: a ::Barrows command ::melee ::Range and ::Mage command
Also i need help ADDING in when you die you drop your items plz reply helping me = admin on my server (which by the way everyone says is fun :D)[br][size=1]Posted at: July 23, 2006, 01:55:20 AM[/size][hr]cant anyone help me?

item.title: Looking for a good coder :(
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok to remove those commands… open client.java and search for customcommand and then u shud see if.commandstartswitth((barrows))
add item blahh well delete allt hat then close,save and run compiler and it shud be disabled

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a good coder :(
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You have to make sure that when you remove the commands from client.java, then you also save it and COMPILE your server before restarting it.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a good coder :(
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

It really shouldn’t be that hard. Just go to client.java and search for ::Barrows and delete that ‘block’ of code. Do the same for the rest. I’ve never coded for a rpivate server, but I dont imagine its that hard. Add me on msn and Ill help.

Read full topic
